name: beast mansion DEMO
description:
(((the intro sequence isn't working in browser play right now, you can watch it right here!)))

CONTROLS:
Left Click to Walk - Collect - Equip an Item - Look at stuff
Right Click to Unequip an Item

THIS IS A DEMO VERSION OF A GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT
Some assets may not be finished and there will be BUGS Please feel free to comment your weird bug findings and constructive criticism below :o)

Captured by some kind of monster animal, you have to find your way out of an not so abandoned mansion. Not only to save yourself, but save your friend as well!

- Trying to be a fun and horrific adventure game about exploring and escaping a former witches mansion, in which you may or may not become a witch yourself -

It's a short game IF you want it to be, but I encourage you to click on everything and try your potions on different objects in the rooms!

   

BTW the music in this game is made by ME, which is why it's pretty awful. If there's anyone interested in taking a commision for a little background music piece for this game, let's get in contact!

Art&Music by me
Music created on beepbox.co
Sfx from Zapsplat.com and freesounds.org
Much appreciated help from Michael Benrad & friends that tested! :0)
